abstract: New York State Court of Appeals declines to hear appeal from several groups seeking release of records in trial surrounding death of Eric Garner at hands of police officers on Staten Island; decision brings to close yearlong effort to reveal records.
lead_paragraph: The decision by New York State’s highest court ended a yearlong legal effort to obtain records from the grand jury that considered evidence in Mr. Garner’s death.

headline.main: Appeals Court Rules for Transcripts in Eric Garner Case to Remain Sealed
headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Transcripts in Garner Case to Remain Sealed, State Court Rules

snippet: The decision by New York State’s highest court ended a yearlong legal effort to obtain records from the grand jury that considered evidence in Mr. Garner’s death.
